Title: Incorporates provisions of the COVID-19 emergency rental assistance program of 2021 into municipal corporation emergency rental assistance programs
Summary: Incorporates provisions of the COVID-19 emergency rental assistance program of 2021 into municipal corporation emergency rental assistance programs.
LawCode: Add Part BB Subpart A ยง15, Chap 56 of 2021
ActClause: AN ACT to amend subpart A of part BB of chapter 56 of the laws of 2021, constituting the COVID-19 emergency rental assistance program act of 2021, in relation to incorporating provisions of the COVID-19 emergency rental assistance program of 2021 into municipal corporation emergency rental assistance programs
